snippet: In a column, the editorial page editor said the paper “blew this one” when it backed Chris Christie as governor of New Jersey instead of State Senator Barbara Buono.
abstract: Tom Moran, editorial page editor of New Jersey's Star-Ledger, writes column calling decision of newspaper to endorse New Jersey Gov Chris Christie for second term 'regrettable.'
lead_paragraph: In a column, the editorial page editor said the paper “blew this one” when it backed Chris Christie as governor of New Jersey instead of State Senator Barbara Buono.

headline.main: Star-Ledger Editor Calls Endorsement of Christie ‘Regrettable’
